div.l: With shetis ⁊and wᵗith chalons faire I spred
Not from his owen bed ten foot or twelve
His douȝter hadde a bed al be her selve
Riȝt in þe same chambir by and by
It myȝte be no bet þe cause whi
Ther was no romer herborow in þe place
They sowpyn and spekyn of solace
And dronkyn evir strong ale atte beste
Aboute mydnyȝt wente þey to reste
Wel hath þis myller vernysshed his hed
Fule pale he was for dronke and nat red
He ȝixith and he spekith þorow the nose
As he were on the quacke or on þe pose
To bedde he goth and with him goth his wif
As ony Iay was she liȝt and iolif
So was her ioli whistil wel y wet
The cradid At here beddis side was set
To rockyn and to yeue þe childe sowke
And whenne þat dronkyn was al in þᵉ crowke
To bedde wente þe douȝter riȝt anone
To bedde goth Aleyn̄ and Also Iohn
Ther is nomore þer nedith ham no dwale
This myller hath so wiseli bibbid Ale
That as an hors he fnortith and slepe
Ne of his tayl behynde he takith no kepe
His wif bare him a burdon ful strong
Men myȝte hem here routyng A furlong
The wenche routid eke ꝑpar company
Aleyn þe clerk þat herde this melody
He pokid Iohn and saide slepist thow
Herdist þou evir such a song or now
Lo whilk a complyn is betwix ham alle
A wilde fire on her bodyis falle
Who herde evir swilk a ferly þyng
Ye þey shal haue þe flour of evil endyng
This longe nyȝt þer tid vs no reste
But ȝit no force al shal be for þe beste
